  • 4. Constraints:

4. Constraints:¶

4.1. Budget:¶

$12,000 in design costs and $2,000 per year for server and maintenance costs.

4.2. Compatibility:¶

4.2.1. Client Compatibility:¶

In the initial application, the application needs to be compatible with different browsers and different versions of the same browser, and for the common browser on the market: Chrome, Firefox, IE, Safari, Edge, Opera, it works. As for future, the application needs to be compatible with different operation systems.

4.2.2. Server Compatibility:¶

The application system need mobility. When there are necessary system update to move the application, it’s easy to transfer. For different server, the application must to be compatible with them.

4.3. Complexity:¶

4.3.1. Spatial Complexity:¶

For the simplicity of the application, we limit the memory footprint of the application to the client, requiring the browser to open the application with a system memory footprint of less than 200MB. On the server side, we limit the memory footprint of the system to 2GB.

4.3.2. Time Complexity:¶

We explained in response time requirements that the response time is not more than 5 seconds. Therefore, the design system needs to consider the time complexity of the system, which requires us to improve the efficiency of the algorithm.
